caption.p: mRNA expression levels of m NOD1 and m NOD2 in vivo following saline, LPS or Poly (I:C) injection. ( a, b, c) Fish were injected intraperitoneally with saline in the spleen, gill, and head kidney after 0, 2, 4, 8, 16, and 24 h post-injection, ( d, e, f) LPS and ( g, h, i) Poly (I:C). Gene expression was determined using real time RT-PCR and was normalized to β-actin. Relative transcription level was obtained by comparing the normalized expression levels between different time points. Vertical bars represent the mean ± S.E. ( n = 3). Asterisks represent significant differences relative to controls ( P < 0.05)
